text:
LORILLARD PUBLIC AFFAIRS COMMITTEE

"8th Floor * One Park Avenue # New York, NY. 100165895,

—
[PETER 4 MAIZULL, Peesuer

Site reco me MBE ORS:

Friends of Cliff Stearns
P.O. Box 308
Silver Springs, FL 34489
Attention: Frank Stafford - Treasurer

Ladies and Gentlemen:

| am pleased to enclose a Lorillard Public Affairs Committee check, in the
amount of $500, payable to Friends of Cliff Stearns.

Please furnish us, at your earliest convenience, with the appropriate receipt

acknowledging this contribution,

Very truly yours,

LUE

Arthuf J. Stevens

AJS:sds
Enclosure

be: S. Wilson, Esq.
Mr. S. Chilcote
Mr. R. Vinovich

bec: Dr. A.W. Spears
Mr. MLL. Orlowsky

‘copy carers es wi he Facer! lin Commies ad ale
Ter tchwn am ne Fan Host Cosoon, ahngen 3 Sah

Of678SS8
